taskDescription:
Percent Error. See Exercise 24 for the definition of percent error.
Hailey and Elsbeth are using an experiment to determine Earth’s gravity. The expected value is 9.807  m / s 2 9.807\text{ m}/{\text{s}^2}. Their experiment gives them a value of 9.457  m / s 2 9.457\text{ m}/{\text{s}^2}. Find the percent error for Hailey and Elsbeth’s experiment.
